div.div: 'TWITTER API DIRTY BOMB' IS THE WORST
Wargames, mutually assured destruction, and the coming battle to control your digital life

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10nEUe2&via=Digg&text=The Cold War In Tech

div.div: TALLEST UNTIL IT CRUMBLES AND KILLS EVERYONE

div.a: China Will Build the Tallest Building In the World in Just 90 Days

div.div: According to its engineers, this will be the tallest skyscraper in the world by the end of March of 2013. Its name is Sky City, and its 2,749 feet (838 meters) distributed in 220 floors will grow in just 90 days in Changsha city, by the Xiangjiang river. Ninety days!

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q79YN9&via=Digg&text=China Will Build the Tallest Building In the World in Just 90 Days

div.a: The Man Who Charged Himself With Murder

div.div: Trevell Coleman wasn’t sure whether he’d killed a man. But after seventeen years, he needed to find out.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RONtLe&via=Digg&text=The Man Who Charged Himself With Murder

div.a: How 'Terminator 2' Created The T1000 Effects Without CGI

div.div: “By far, the most challenging things we did for Terminator 2 were these physical effects involving the T-1000 character. We did a lot of in-camera magic tricks for that — splitting open bodies, finger blades, heads blowing open, bullet-hit wounds."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wr0gYM&via=Digg&text=How 'Terminator 2' Created The T1000 Effects Without CGI

div.a: Twinkies On The Path To Extinction... Again

div.div: Hostess Brands announced on Tuesday night that despite the help of a mediator, it had failed to reach a new labor agreement with the bakery workers union – and union officials said the company had indicated it would proceed with plans to liquidate.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qtndt2&via=Digg&text=Twinkies On The Path To Extinction... Again

div.a: The Real Problem With The iPhone 'Sexting' App

div.div: Snapchat shares photos that self-destruct. It says it's not about sexting, even though that's how it's used by some teens. But you definitely shouldn't use it for sexting.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UGcXJ5&via=Digg&text=The Real Problem With The iPhone 'Sexting' App

div.a: Hitler's Forgotten Attempt To Build The World's Largest Olympic Stadium

div.div: On September 7, 1937, German construction workers laid the cornerstone for what was to become the world's largest stadium — one that would hold over 400,000 spectators.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/107oqb0&via=Digg&text=Hitler's Forgotten Attempt To Build The World's Largest Olympic Stadium

div.a: Five Myths About The Chinese Internet

div.div: The Great Firewall is neither great, nor a firewall. Discuss.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UgjhJs&via=Digg&text=Five Myths About The Chinese Internet

div.a: Here Is What Louisiana Schoolchildren Learn About Evolution

div.div: Fifth graders in some state-sponsored schools in Louisiana study both creationism and evolution as competing theories. “Fact or Theory?”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/URtAru&via=Digg&text=Here Is What Louisiana Schoolchildren Learn About Evolution

div.div: THINGS YOU DIDN'T LEARN IN DRIVER'S ED

div.a: 6 Little-Known Driving Tips That Could Save Your Life

div.div: If you're reading this, hopefully it means that you are intent on doing what it takes to survive in a world full of such drivers by being just a little more careful. So for you, here are some advanced tips that everyone should know, even if most people don't.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XZa6le&via=Digg&text=6 Little-Known Driving Tips That Could Save Your Life

div.a: Designer Behind First iPod Touch Has A New Toy On Kickstarter

div.div: Just in time for the holidays, Michael Rosenblatt, the lead designer of the first iPod Touch, has a new toy — Atoms Express. Atoms Express is a modular building toy that claims to let kids “make things that do things.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WiQNxX&via=Digg&text=Designer Behind First iPod Touch Has A New Toy On Kickstarter

div.div: DO YOU GET MEDALS FOR RETWEETS?

div.a: Meet The 'Kids' Fighting Israel's War Over Social Media

div.div: Young Israeli soldiers have pushed older commanders into adopting a more aggressive social media strategy

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S8nYGn&via=Digg&text=Meet The 'Kids' Fighting Israel's War Over Social Media

div.a: The Meanest Microsoft Surface Review Yet

div.div: What happens when a self-proclaimed Apple fanboy buys a Microsoft Surface tablet, tries it out for a week, and then tries to reviews it? Well, he hates it so much that he throws it in the trash, obviously.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S8tcll&via=Digg&text=The Meanest Microsoft Surface Review Yet

div.a: Is NASA Close To Announcing A Discovery For The 'History Books?'

div.div: Scientists working on NASA's six-wheeled rover on Mars have a problem. But it's a good problem. They have some exciting new results from one of the rover's instruments.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TdyaNA&via=Digg&text=Is NASA Close To Announcing A Discovery For The 'History Books?'

div.a: Microsoft Using Poop To Power Its Latest Data Center

div.div: Sometimes, power goes out, data centers go down, and people get annoyed. Now Microsoft is building a more reliable data center, powered by the byproducts of life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SZY44L&via=Digg&text=Microsoft Using Poop To Power Its Latest Data Center

div.div: COME FOR THE LINGERIE, STAY FOR THE GAME

Those overly manicured lanky Playmates awkwardly colliding into one another? That's your grandpa's LFL. (Or, more accurately, your slightly older sibling's.) See, something happened to the league that once featured Angie Everhart as a team captain: It got serious.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Te8ikD&via=Digg&text=Lingerie League Goes Legit

div.div: NOT IF SKRILLEX CAN HELP IT

div.a: Will We Ever Run Out Of New Music?

div.div: Given there are a finite number of tones are ears can recognize and only so many combinations of those notes, will we run out of music at some point in the future?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WiyzwD&via=Digg&text=Will We Ever Run Out Of New Music?

div.a: Could A Sonic Weapon Make Your Head Explode?

div.div: Infrasonic sound can have very unusual non-auditory effects on the body. But does it kill?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xxg3a4&via=Digg&text=Could A Sonic Weapon Make Your Head Explode?

div.a: What Is The Most Popular Thanksgiving Pie?

div.div: Here’s a look at the top 9 pie types Americans are eating this Thanksgiving.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TbWxwb&via=Digg&text=What Is The Most Popular Thanksgiving Pie?

div.a: Why Is China Censoring A Fake Photo Of Its Leaders Doing 'Gangnam Style?'

div.div: Following China's major party congress, a widely followed user on China’s popular Twitter-like service, Weibo, posted the image with a banal message about the song’s popularity. Censors pulled it down almost immediately.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UQTlm0&via=Digg&text=Why Is China Censoring A Fake Photo Of Its Leaders Doing 'Gangnam Style?'

div.div: Just when you thought it was safe to tickle Elmo again, the erstwhile settled sex scandal roars back with a vengeance.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QVV91p&via=Digg&text=Elmo Resigns

div.a: How Did Beethoven Really Come Up With 'Dah-Dah-Dah-Duh?'

div.div: So many people have found so much meaning in just those first four notes. But an author says that we really don't know all that much of what Beethoven meant by them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QsUCUM&via=Digg&text=How Did Beethoven Really Come Up With 'Dah-Dah-Dah-Duh?'

div.a: Did Kennedy's Inauguration Make Hats Uncool?

div.div: Was JFK responsible for killing the traditional hat?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UbV1d6&via=Digg&text=Did Kennedy's Inauguration Make Hats Uncool?

div.a: The Whiff Of White Could Hide Strong Odors

div.div: Neither pleasant nor foul-smelling, and in no way overwhelming: this is how researchers sum up the smell they are calling “olfactory white.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SZwUv2&via=Digg&text=The Whiff Of White Could Hide Strong Odors

div.div: Is Twitter guilty of aiding Hamas terrorism? That’s what a petition by the pro-Israel group Christians United for Israel (CUFI) claims.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TOiwo8&via=Digg&text=Is Hamas's Twitter Account Illegal?

div.div: DOESN'T THE WORLD END IN A FEW WEEKS?

div.a: The World Will Be A More Peaceful Place In 2050

div.div: An upcoming paper by a political scientist will claim that in 40 years world conflict will plummet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10kU180&via=Digg&text=The World Will Be A More Peaceful Place In 2050

div.div: Printed by Joshua Himes in 1842, A Chronological Chart of the Visions of Daniel and John, integrates the visual logic of the timeline, chronological calculus and apocalyptic symbolism in a single scheme.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SHFcaE&via=Digg&text=The Forefather Of Infographics

div.div: This Sunday, 500 people will flock to a conference hall in East London to be bored. Over the course of seven hours, they will hear talks on, among other things, pylons, self-service checkouts, double-yellow lines – as in the ones on the road – shop fronts and gardening.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QW4C8O&via=Digg&text=The History Of Boredom

div.a: Insider Traders, Drug Dealers — The Language Is Much The Same

div.div: A group of high-school buddies accused of making more than $1.4 million in an insider-trading ring were obviously fans of "The Wire" or some other drug crime drama.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T1zYqi&via=Digg&text=Insider Traders, Drug Dealers — The Language Is Much The Same

div.div: GLUE CAN BE USED FOR ALMOST ANYTHING
"I get hurt all the time. I get cut all the time. If I get cut, I use electrical tape, the glue seems to kill stuff, and it’s way cheaper than bandaids."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U4SMbG&via=Digg&text=How To Live Without Insurance

div.a: Are Cash Traps The New Card Skimmers?

div.div: There's no shortage of ingenious card skimmers out on the streets to part you from your cash. But there might be a new, more direct breed of scam in town: a simple cash trap.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RQLgiB&via=Digg&text=Are Cash Traps The New Card Skimmers?

div.div: Growing a moustache for charity in November, a.k.a. Movember, is becoming increasingly common. But why should cultivating a small strip of facial hair be perceived as such a challenge or achievement? Turns out, there's a lot of complex science behind the moustache, not just an upper lip.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XwyhZd&via=Digg&text=The Science Behind Movember

div.a: How Goatse.cx Went From Shock Site To Webmail Service

div.div: Owner spent $10,000 to preserve "Internet generation's cultural legacy."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U9hupz&via=Digg&text=How Goatse.cx Went From Shock Site To Webmail Service

div.a: 10 Ways To Cook A Turkey This Thanksgiving

div.div: Typically, this time of year people young and old are focused on the three F’s: friends, food, and football. This week, however, most of us will probably only have one thing on the brain: turkey.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TNetbO&via=Digg&text=10 Ways To Cook A Turkey This Thanksgiving
